info.title: Long Term Benefit Calculation
info.description:
# Usage Terms
These interfaces are business-critical interfaces for HMRC and DWP, supporting thousands of staff - all consumption, or change in consumption levels, should be registered and fully approved (see Registered Consumers below).

get.summary: Retrieve Long Term Benefit Calculation Details.
get.description:
# Purpose
This API is used to retrieve Long Term Benefit calculation details from NPS (National Insurance & PAYE Service). It forms part of the NI Long Term Benefits Processing.

## Version Log
| Version | Date | Author | Description |
|---------|------|--------|-------------|
| 0.0.1 | 10/12/2025 | NPS Development Team  | Initial Draft  |

maximallyPopulatedResponseBereavementBen.summary: Maximally populated response when benefit type is BEREAVEMENT BENEFIT and PensionProcessingArea is Job Centre+ Electronic Enabled Pension Processing

maximallyPopulatedResponseStandardEEPP.summary: Maximally populated response when PensionProcessingArea is Standard Electronic Enabled Pension Processing

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.
correlationId.name: correlationId

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call.
govUkOriginatorId.name: gov-uk-originator-id

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.
govUkOrganisationId.name: gov-uk-organisation-id

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.
govUkUserId.name: gov-uk-user-id

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.
govUkUserName.name: gov-uk-user-name

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.
govUkJobRole.name: gov-uk-job-role

Identifier.name: identifier
Identifier.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) or a National Insurance Number (NINO).

AssociatedCalculationSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the associated calculation history (i.e. row) of the associated calculation details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.
AssociatedCalculationSequenceNumber.name: seqNo

BenefitType.description: Denotes the area responsible for the electronic enabling of the pensions processing.
BenefitType.name: type

PensionProcessingArea.description: Denotes the area responsible for the electronic enabling of the pensions processing.
PensionProcessingArea.name: pensionProcessingArea

enum: SRB ISSUED - CHANGE TO FLAT RATE RECORD (<1948)
SRB ISSUED - CHANGE TO GRB RECORD
SRB ISSUED - CONTRIBUTION/CREDIT CHANGE IN FRY TAX YEAR
SRB ISSUED - CONTRIBUTION/CREDIT CHANGE IN PRE-FRY TAX YEAR
SRB ISSUED - DATE OF BIRTH CHANGE (WIDOW)
SRB ISSUED - PERSONAL DETAILS CHANGE (ACCOUNT HOLDER)
SRB ISSUED - RETROSPECTIVE PP OPTION RECEIVED
Job Centre+ Electronic Enabled Pension Processing

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.

identifier.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) e.g. 00A00000 or a National Insurance Number (NINO) e.g. AA000001A.

associatedCalculationSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the associated calculation history (i.e. row) of the associated calculation details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

benefitType.description: Denotes the type of benefit that is being claimed by the individual.

pensionProcessingArea.description: Denotes the area responsible for the electronic enabling of the pensions processing.

errorResponse_400.description: Array of Error Response Failure Object in Error Response.
errorResponse_400.title: Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_403.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponse_403.title: Forbidden Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the Forbidden Error.

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_422.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponse_422.title: Error Response

errorResponseFailure_422.description: Array of Error Response Failure Object in Error Response.
errorResponseFailure_422.title: Failure Object in Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the error that has occurred.

BenefitCalculationDetail.description: Contains benefit calculation details for an individual.

nationalInsuranceNumber.description: National Insurance Number - unique for an individual - note not all individuals qualify to be issued with one.

benefitType.description: Denotes the type of benefit that is being claimed by the individual.

associatedCalculationSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the associated calculation history (i.e. row) of the associated calculation details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

calculationStatus.description: Denotes the status or type of calculation performed.

substitutionMethod1.description: Denotes the first substitution method applicable for the Long Term Benefit (LTB) calculation.

substitutionMethod2.description: Denotes the second substitution method applicable for the Long Term Benefit (LTB) calculation.

calculationDate.description: The date on which the benefit calculation was performed as part of the benefit calculation details.

guaranteedMinimumPensionContractedOutDed.description: Denotes the value of the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) pre 1988
Denotes the value of the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) post 1988

contractedOutDeductionsPre1988.description: Denotes the value of the Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) pre 1988

contractedOutDeductionsPost1988.description: Denotes the value of the Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) post 1988

additionalPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the additional pension percentage. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

basicPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the percentage of a basic pension that the individual is currently eligible for.

survivorsBenefitAgeRelatedPensionPercent.description: Denotes the age related pension percentage for a widow/widower or surviving civil partner. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalAgeRelatedPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the age related additional pension percentage. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedBasicPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the basic pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedAdditionalPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the additional pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedGraduatedPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the graduated pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedGraduatedBenefit.description: The value of the inherited graduated benefit by a surviving spouse or civil partner of a person with entitlement to that benefit.

calculationSource.description: Denotes the source that triggered the calculation.

payday.description: Denotes the day of the week that the benefit is paid to the customer.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the individual.

husbandDateOfDeath.description: The date on which the individual's husband deceased.

additionalPost1997PensionPercentage.description: Denotes the additional pension percentage from 1997. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalPost1997AgeRelatedPensionPerce.description: Denotes the age related additional pension percentage from 1997. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalPensionNotionalPercentage.description: Denotes the notional additional pension percentage. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalPost1997PensionNotionalPercent.description: Denotes the notional additional pension percentage from 1997. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedAdditionalPensionNotionalPercen.description: Denotes the notional additional pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritableAdditionalPensionPercentage.description: Denotes the percentage of an additional pension that can be inherited.

additionalPost2002PensionNotionalPercent.description: Denotes the notional additional pension percentage from 2002. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalPost2002PensionPercentage.description: Denotes the additional pension percentage from 2002. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedAdditionalPost2002PensionNotion.description: Denotes the post-2002 notional additional pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

inheritedAdditionalPost2002PensionPercen.description: Denotes the post-2002 additional pension percentage that a widow/widower or surviving civil partner may inherit from their partner's additional state pension. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

additionalPost2002AgeRelatedPensionPerce.description: Denotes the age related additional pension percentage from 2002. Value precision allows for up to 6 decimal places - i.e. 10, 10.5, 10.56, 10.567, 10.5678, 10.56789, 10.567890 are all accepted values.

singleContributionConditionRulesApply.description: Denotes whether or not single contribution condition rules apply.

BenefitCalculationDetails.description: Contains benefit calculation details for an individual.

additionalPensionAmountPre1997.description: Denotes the cash value of the individual's additional pension from tax years prior to 1997.

additionalPensionAmountPost1997.description: Denotes the cash value of the individual's additional pension from tax years after 1997.

pre97AgeRelatedAdditionalPension.description: Denotes the Widow(er)'s Benefit Pre-Year 1997 Age Related Additional Pension Amount.

post97AgeRelatedAdditionalPension.description: Denotes the Widow(er)'s Benefit Post Year 1997 Age Related Additional Pension Amount.

basicPensionIncrementsCashValue.description: Denotes the incremental basic pension cash value amount inherited from a former spouse.

additionalPensionIncrementsCashValue.description: Denotes the incremental additional pension cash value amount inherited from a former spouse.

graduatedRetirementBenefitCashValue.description: Denotes the entitlement amount for a national state pension when payments from earnings related pensions are added on top as part of the Graduated Retirement Benefit Scheme.

totalGuaranteedMinimumPension.description: Denotes the total Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) amount that an individual can receive.

totalNonGuaranteedMinimumPension.description: Denotes the total Non-Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) amount that an individual can receive.

longTermBenefitsIncrementalCashValue.description: Denotes the incremental cash value amount for Graduated Retirement Benefits.

greatBritainPaymentAmount.description: Denotes the Widow(er)'s Benefit Great Britain Payment Amount.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the individual.

notionalPost1997AdditionalPension.description: Denotes the cash value of the notional post 1997 additional pension.

notionalPre1997AdditionalPension.description: Denotes the cash value of the notional pre 1997 additional pension.

inheritableNotionalAdditionalPensionIncr.description: Denotes the cash value of the notional additional pension increments inherited from a former spouse.

conditionOneSatisfied.description: Denotes the status around whether or not condition one for Basic Pensions has been satisfied.

reasonForFormIssue.description: Denotes the reason that the form was issued.

longTermBenefitsCategoryACashValue.description: Denotes the total cash value for Category A Long Term Benefits.

longTermBenefitsCategoryBLCashValue.description: Denotes the total cash value for Category BL Long Term Benefits.

longTermBenefitsUnitValue.description: Denotes the unit value amount for Graduated Retirement Benefits.

additionalNotionalPensionAmountPost2002.description: Denotes the notional cash value of the individual's additional pension from tax years after 2002.

additionalPensionAmountPost2002.description: Denotes the cash value of the individual's additional pension from tax years after 2002.

additionalNotionalPensionIncrementsInher.description: Denotes the notional cash value of additional pension increments inherited from a former spouse after April 2002 under the State Second Pension.

additionalPensionIncrementsInheritedPost.description: Denotes the cash value of additional pension increments inherited from a former spouse after April 2002 under the State Second Pension.

post02AgeRelatedAdditionalPension.description: Denotes the Widow(er)'s Benefit Post Year 2002 Age Related Additional Pension Amount.

pre1975ShortTermBenefits.description: Denotes the number of pre-1975 short term benefits held.

operativeBenefitStartDate.description: Denotes the start date reported for the operative benefit.

sicknessBenefitStatusForReports.description: Denotes the sickness benefit status for reporting.

GetLongTermBenefitCalculationDetailsResp.description: Success response payload for this API.

statePensionAgeBefore2010TaxYear.description: Denotes whether or not the State Pension Age (SPA) for the individual falls before the date 06/04/2010.

statePensionAgeAfter2016TaxYear.description: Denotes whether or not the State Pension Age (SPA) for the individual falls after the date 05/04/2016.

NewStatePensionCalculationDetails.description: Contains details related to a new state pension calculation.

netAdditionalPensionPre1997.description: Denotes the net amount of additional pension after subtracting an individual's Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) for tax years post 1997.

oldRulesStatePensionEntitlement.description: Denotes the State Pension entitlement accrued up to 2016 under the old rules.

netRulesAmount.description: Denotes the net rules amount for New State Pension (NSP) calculations from 06/04/2016.

derivedRebateAmount.description: Denotes the derived rebate amount to use when adjusting the gross new rules amount to take account of the periods of contracting-out.

initialStatePensionAmount.description: The initial value of the person's state pension.

protectedPayment2016.description: Denotes the protected payment amount for the insured person at or before 2016.

minimumQualifyingPeriodMet.description: Denotes whether or not the minimum qualifying period for a New State Pension has been met.

qualifyingYearsAfter2016.description: Denotes the number of qualifying years from 2016/2017 onwards.

newStatePensionQualifyingYears.description: Denotes the number of qualifying years that the individual has towards their New State Pension (NSP).

newStatePensionRequisiteYears.description: Denotes the number of requisite years that the individual has towards their New State Pension (NSP).

newStatePensionEntitlement.description: Denotes the New State Pension entitlement for an individual.

protectedPayment.description: Denotes the protected payment amount for the insured person.

pensionSharingOrderContractedOutEmployme.description: Denotes whether or not a pension sharing order applies to a Contracted-Out Employments Group (COEG).

pensionSharingOrderStateEarningsRelatedP.description: Denotes whether or not a pension sharing order applies to a State Earnings Related Pension Scheme (SERPS).

considerReducedRateElection.description: Denotes whether or not a reduced rate of election should be considered.

weeklyBudgetingLoanAmount.description: Denotes the weekly budgeting loan amount for a given tax year, based on the number of qualifying years - weekly amounts come from Reference Data Classes CATBLRT1 for qualifying years 0-15 and CATBLRT2 for qualifying years 16+.

calculationDate.description: The date on which the benefit calculation was performed as part of the benefit calculation details.

officeLocationDecode.description: A unique identifier for an office location.

officeLocationValue.description: The description of the office location.
